players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I saw Diana being killed last night. I think the mafioso might be Charlie or Bob."
Bob: "Charlie, I think you're the mafioso. Alice, I believe you are telling the truth."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice

players.name: Bob

Alice: "I saw Diana being killed last night. I think the mafioso might be Charlie or Bob."
You: "Charlie, I think you're the mafioso. Alice, I believe you are telling the truth."
